short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the expierence on MySchoolApp websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduces many new features for .myschoolapp websites.

Feature List
 - Dark mode
 - GPA calculator
 - Assignment notes
 - Automatically show grades
 - Automatically sort assignments by date

Changelog
 - v4.1.4: Bug fixes
 - v4.1.3: Bug fixes
 - v4.1.2: Bug fixes
 - v4.0.1: Bug fixes
 - v4.0.0: Class tab in assignments
 - v3.4.1: Assignment notes, bug fixes, expanded dark mode
 - v3.2.0 Bug fixes, expanded dark mode
